list_translation_mean.translate_mean: người cầm đầu máy xe lửa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person who runs, especially in a specified way.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Mary là một người chạy nhanh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person who smuggles specified goods into or out of a country or area.
a rod, groove, or blade on which something slides.
a shoot, typically leafless, which grows from the base of a plant along the surface of the ground and can take root at points along its length.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: it's not always easy to find strawberry runners with good strong roots
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Không phải lúc nào cũng dễ dàng tìm thấy những người chạy dâu tây với rễ mạnh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a long, narrow rug or strip of carpet, especially for a hall or stairway.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a faded runner held in place with brass stair rods
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một người chạy phai màu được giữ tại chỗ với thanh cầu thang bằng đồng thau

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a fast-swimming fish of the jack family, occurring in tropical seas.
